name: Chilly and Me
description:
Chilly and me is a Christian short story about a boy named Issac and his pet chinchilla Chilly. At first, they are really close, but later Chilly grows to resent Isaac. 

The boy will need to make a tough choice between his pet's well being. 

This was a old Vn I made back in

Made in April 2021
